title: Split Large Integration Adapter Files (>1000 lines each)
description: Refactor 5 large files (webhooks/auth.py, integrations/ticket_mapping.py, integrations/servicenow_adapter.py, consumers/event_consumer.py, integrations/jira_adapter.py) by splitting them into smaller, focused modules following Single Responsibility Principle

phases.title: Analysis and Preparation
phases.description: Analyze file dependencies, identify imports, and prepare refactoring strategy

subtasks.title: Analyze webhooks/auth.py structure and dependencies
subtasks.description: Map out all classes, functions, and their dependencies in auth.py to plan the split
subtasks.notes: Completed comprehensive analysis. Created auth_py_analysis.md with detailed mapping of 7 exceptions, 2 models, 1 abstract base, 3 handlers, 1 registry, and 4 factory functions. Identified single external dependency (WebhookAuthType). Proposed split into 8 modules, all under 350 lines.

subtasks.title: Analyze integrations/ticket_mapping.py structure
subtasks.description: Map out all classes, functions, and dependencies in ticket_mapping.py
subtasks.notes: Completed comprehensive analysis. Created ticket_mapping_py_analysis.md with detailed mapping of 5 enums, 3 default mappings, 6 models, 1 validator class, 1 transformer registry with 10 built-in functions, 1 main mapper class, and 2 factory functions. Identified 2 external dependencies (EventSeverity, IntegrationEvent). Proposed split into 7 modules (enums, models, validators, transformers, mapper, defaults, __init__), all under 400 lines.

subtasks.title: Analyze adapters and consumer structure
subtasks.description: Map out structure for servicenow_adapter.py, event_consumer.py, and jira_adapter.py
subtasks.notes: Completed comprehensive analysis. Created adapters_consumer_analysis.md with detailed mapping of all 3 files (3233 total lines). ServiceNow: 2 enums, 2 default mappings, 1 credentials model, 1 adapter class (17 methods). Event Consumer: 2 enums, 3 models (GovernanceEvent, EventConsumerMetrics, EventConsumerConfig), 1 consumer class (25 methods). Jira: 1 enum, 1 default mapping, 1 credentials model, 1 adapter class (16 methods). Proposed splits: ServiceNow → 6 modules (all under 300 lines), Event Consumer → 6 modules (all under 450 lines), Jira → 6 modules (all under 350 lines).

subtasks.title: Check test coverage and dependencies
subtasks.description: Identify all tests that import from target files and document import patterns
subtasks.notes: Completed comprehensive test coverage analysis. Created test_coverage_analysis.md documenting all test files and import patterns for the 5 target files. Key findings: 3/5 files have test coverage (auth.py, jira_adapter.py, servicenow_adapter.py), 2/5 files lack tests (event_consumer.py, ticket_mapping.py). Identified 3 import patterns: test-only imports, package re-exports, and unused/internal modules. Documented backward compatibility requirements: auth must export 15+ symbols, jira 3 symbols, servicenow 3+ symbols, event_consumer 6 symbols. All import locations documented for update during refactoring phases.
